name: get to work or company die
name_original: get to work or company die
description:
So this is my first ever game jam and to be honest I think I did a preet good job considering that i was able to work on this game for 2 of the 3 days and im fearly new to gamedevelopment.

The game is based on a guy who has to get to work before its too late or else the company he works for will die .

honestly there´s no point on collecting the coins I just made the so the game could be a bit more fun.
